article_title: Authors lament how Obama compromised too much, left working class behind
article_text:
03:08

KC author Whitney Terrell on his new novel, 'The Good Lieutenant'

article_metadata.news-keywords: book review, listen liberal, thomas frank, bill press, buyer's remorse
article_metadata.description: Bill Press’ “Buyer’s Remorse” and Thomas Frank’s “Listen, Liberal” argue that President Obama slowly killed the old Democratic Party, the one who represented the working class.
